short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Amazon Hidden or archived Orders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to hide the list of hidden or archived orders on Amazon.

It also allows you to delete the "Hidden Orders" option from the order selection filter.

It's fully configurable by inspecting DOM elements.

Default configuration works with

www.amazon.com
www.amazon.co.uk
www.amazon.de
www.amazon.it
www.amazon.fr
